Reviews.Title: terrible photo quality
Reviews.Author: ElizabethD
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my 5 year old to have his own starter camera.  It takes awful photos--hard to see through the lens and blurry product.  My 5 year old takes quality photos with our Canon digital camera and I tried to take the photos myself, so I know it's the camera being pretty awful and not my son's abilities.  Don't waste your money!

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Holt
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my great neice for Christmas. She was very excited to have her own camera and is taking it on her first ski trip. This is the perfect gift for a teenager.

ProductInfo.Features:
5.0 MP
Captures Digital Still and Video
8X Digital Zoom
1.5" Color LTPS LCD Display
MAC/PC & Linux 8.0 Compatible
ProductInfo.Name: VistaQuest 5.0 MegaPixel Digital Still and Video Camera
